background.description: Default background color of main components including the body

foreground.description: Used for the text color for background coloured components

muted.description: Muted backgrounds such as Tabs, Skeletons and Switches

muted-foreground.description: Paired text colour for muted components

popover.description: Background color for popovers such as DropdownMenus, HoverCards, and Popovers

popover-foreground.description: Paired foreground colour for popover style

input.description: Border color for inputs such as <Input />, <Select />, <Textarea />

accent.description: Used for accents such as hover effects on DropdownMenuItems and SelectItems

accent-foreground.description: Paired foreground style for accent styling

destructive.description: Used for destructive actions such as Delete Buttons

destructive-foreground.description: Foreground used for destructive actions such as Delete Buttons

chart-3.description: Extra colour for charts with many colours

chart-4.description: Extra colour for charting with many colours

chart-5.description: Extra colour for charting with many colours
